<h1 class="header-title">

<h4>Discount color explanation</h4>
<p><span class="price-discount-major">Blue discount</span> Product has not been this cheap before (new historical low)</p>
<p><span class="price-discount">Green discount</span> Product is priced on par with lowest recorded price</p>
<p><span class="price-discount-minor">Purple discount</span> Product is priced on par with lowest recorded price in last two years</p>
